docs.lead_paragraph: The Olympic Games, which opened in Mexico City yesterday, have drawn the largest contingent of physicians and physiologists ever assembled at most scientifically studied sports event in history. a sports event.

headline.main: Olympic Game Health; Mexico City Events to Be Watched By Scientists for Many Unusual Aspects

docs.abstract: Dr H A Rusk notes games have attracted record number of physicians and physiologists who will study various med aspects of games, including effects of high alt and sex determination tests
docs.snippet: The Olympic Games, which opened in Mexico City yesterday, have drawn the largest contingent of physicians and physiologists ever assembled at most scientifically studied sports event in history. a sports event.

headline.main: Hepatitis Is Mysterious, Elusive and On the Increase; Hepatitis is mysterious, elusive, on the increase
